documentation.value: Region of interest is specified as a 0-based integer interval range. Variants that overlap the range are returned.
Genomic reference sequence is a valid NCBI chromosome-level ('NC_') build 37 or build 38 identifier, or a valid mitochondrion identifier (NC_012920.1, NC_001807.4).

Returned report contains a diagnostic report which contains a single region studied profile, which reflects back the query parameters; zero to many variants found in the region; and zero to many sequence phase relationships between found variants.
